Posts.Content: hi this is really hard for me ...sorry but my mother was just diagnosed with breast cancer i am 21 and this is the hardest thing i have had to deal with in my life. what do i need to do that i can help her my mother is the light of my life the one person who is always there when i am sad or hurt.Â  i want o be her rock what can i do . please keep us in your prayers.
Posts.Title: hi
